answers.answer: None of these should affect your sperm count. Zoloft can affect you sex drive, but not always. If you and your wife are having relations, and already have a child, I would recommend going ahead and trying again when you are ready - if you are not pregnant in 4-6 months a sperm count will be helpful.

question: I have typeII diabetes and im on meaformin also lipotor, zolft, and quinaprill for my pressure. will this combination of drugs effect my sperm counts etc. My wife and i want to have another child but we are affraid that these my effect me so that she will not get pregnant. if it does what can i do so that it doesnt?????
title: worried about
